input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineering I

Location: Alpharetta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
At LexisNexis® Risk Solutions, we believe in using data for good to solve problems and positively impact people, industry, and society. We deliver enhanced value to our customers by leveraging the power of insight through data, advanced analytics, and innovative technologies to help them solve problems, make better decisions, and improve operations.

We value our people. People are our most valuable asset and drive the innovation that fuels our success. With about 10,000 employees across all brands in locations around the world, we embrace a diverse and inclusive workforce with a value system to support it. We provide employees the freedom to drive change, the trust to find their own path, and the space to explore more.

As you begin to define a career once you have completed your education. We would love for you to consider bringing your value to LexisNexis® Risk Solutions.

If you wish to join a dynamic and innovative software development team, are eager to learn, and are excited to be part of a company with a strong technology structure and a product that makes a difference, we encourage you to apply for our Entry Level Software Development role.

Visit our careers page at https://risk.lexisnexis.com/corporate/careers to learn more about the position and submit your application.

What sets LexisNexis® Risk Solutions apart:

Diversity & Inclusion As a company with customers all over the world, we truly value diversity and believe that an inclusive environment is essential for nurturing big ideas and developing industry-changing innovation. We are committed to supporting a high-performing and diverse workforce that mirrors the markets we serve. We celebrate our uniqueness and advocate for inclusion for all. Our areas of focus include:

Representation at all levels of the organizationAccelerate and develop women and ethnicity representation in senior leadershipImplement programs and practices that ensure equity for all employeesChampion inclusive culture of psychological safety

Corporate Social Responsibility Corporate Responsibility is about how we do business and manage our company’s impact on our environment, society, communities, and people. We are committed to advancing these objectives globally with our programs.

Data for Good - use our knowledge, data, and expertise to help those in needSustainability – work to increase the positive impact on the environmentCommunity/CARES – employee volunteering and givingLiving Well – employee mental health and physical well-being programs

We are an industry leader. Our LexisNexis Risk Solutions go-to-market brand is the trusted data analytics provider for organizations seeking actionable insights to manage risks, find opportunities and improve results. We deliver targeted solutions that empower well-informed decisions while upholding the highest standards for security and privacy. We leverage our industry-leading Big Data computing platform with vast data assets, proprietary advanced linking technology, and a sophisticated analytics platform to drive decision intelligence for our customers, enabling businesses of all sizes to turn their data into actionable insights and improve decisions and time-to-results.

We believe in growing the knowledge, talent, and capability of our employee base. We provide career management tools and information, and our leadership is committed to retaining and growing our employees.

We are a growing company. Since 2000, we have scaled through innovation and growth in core businesses and expansion into attractive adjacent and international markets, completing 25 acquisitions and mergers in the last ten years. Our 3,500 Global technology employee base supports all the business and market initiatives.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Software Engineering I
output_json.summary: Join LexisNexis® Risk Solutions as an entry-level software developer in Alpharetta, GA.
job_responsibilities: Learn and adapt to new technologies
Work within a dynamic and innovative team
output_json.company_information: LexisNexis® Risk Solutions is a global data analytics provider with a focus on enhancing customer value through data-driven insights and advanced technologies.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: LexisNexis® Risk Solutions is committed to diversity, inclusion, corporate social responsibility, and fostering a high-performing, diverse workforce.

other.content: Visit the careers page at https://risk.lexisnexis.com/corporate/careers for more details and to apply.
